changeSet.sql: create table contractor ( id varchar(12) primary key not null, parent_id varchar(12) references contractor (id), name text not null, name_full text, inn text, ogrn text, country text references country (id), industry int4 references industry (id), org_form int4 references org_form(id), create_date timestamp not null default now(), modify_date timestamp, create_user_id text, modify_user_id text, is_active boolean not null default true );
